name: get_competitor_pricing
description: Retrieve current pricing data for berry products from specified competitors

berry_types.description: List of berry types to check pricing for (e.g., strawberries, blueberries, raspberries)

competitors.description: List of competitor names or IDs to check pricing from

location.description: Geographic location or market area for pricing data

time_range.description: Time period for pricing data (e.g., current, last_week, last_month)

name: analyze_price_trends
description: Analyze pricing trends and patterns for berry products across competitors over time

berry_type.description: Specific berry type to analyze pricing trends for

include_seasonal.description: Whether to include seasonal pricing patterns in the analysis

name: get_market_price_summary
description: Get aggregated price summary statistics for berry products including min, max, average, and median prices across all competitors

berry_category.description: Berry category or specific type for price summary

package_size.description: Package size or weight specification (e.g., 1lb, 6oz, bulk)
